alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northeastern Nye County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Northwestern Nye County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 14 at 2:38PM PDT until March 15 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of eastern, north central, northeast, northwest and south central Nevada. * WHEN...From 11 AM Tuesday to 11 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Blowing and drifting of snow and dust leading to reduced visibility, strong crosswinds affecting driving conditions, along with a few power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust and snow could reduce visibility, and strong cross winds affecting area roadways leading to adverse driving conditions.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
